title: Treasure Mother, Treasure Girl
overview: Following a mistake on the job and due to health reasons, Lian Zhi Ming retires from being a cop after over 30 years. The marriages of his three lovely daughters, Lian Hui Shan, Lian Xin and Lian Zi, become the main focus of his concerns, and the return of his ex-wife Qin Bai He creates further waves in an already precarious home situation.
